name: Herbie
tagline: Herbie is a light-weight diagnostics tool. It shows the current CPU and RAM usage on your desktop.
body:
# Herbie - Diagnostics
Herbie is a small CPU/Memory Monitoring Widget for Windows. It is licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.

## [Download](https://github.com/diemmarkus/Herbie/releases/download/0.2/herbie-setup.exe)
You can [download] (https://github.com/diemmarkus/Herbie/releases/download/0.2/herbie-setup.exe) the installer. Herbie is supported on windows 7/8/10.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
